item.title: New YA Book Releases for October 15, 2025
item.description: From a climate change dystopian read to a queer Christmas fake-dating romance and more, dive into this week's array of new YA book releases.

item.title: 7 Spirited Graphic Novels for Halloween
item.description: Spotlighting a mix of horror and cozy, the familiar and the fantastical, consider cuddling up with these seven festive books to celebrate Halloween.

item.title: The Most Underrated Historical Fiction According to Goodreads and Storygraph
item.description: Will you recognize any of these six underrated historical fiction books, all with under 1,000 ratings on Goodreads and Storygraph?
